name: Carta para Mauritsstad
description:
This game was developed in 48h, during the Noord Gamejam, which happened in Recife, Pernambuco, Brazil, in december 13-15, 2019.

This game got the 2nd place/prize in the competition!

It's a puzzle game that challanges the player (from the future) to travel in time and solve some puzzles in order to find a letter (from Mautisstad) that needs to be delivered. This letter may change his future!

TEAM:

Marcelino Borges - Programming and UI

Rodrigo Silva - Programming

Caio Filizola - 3D arts

Clara Costa - 3D arts

Flávio Matos - 2D arts

Sam Nóbrega - Music and SFX

Everyone helped  with the Game Design somehow.

Made with Unreal Engine 4.
